bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to create a transportation oversight committee. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 2-6 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: There is hereby created the Legislative Transportation Oversight Committee. The committee shall consist of four legislators, one appointed by the majority leader and one appointed by the minority leader of the Senate and one appointed by the majority leader and one appointed by the minority leader of the House of Representatives. The committee shall monitor the meetings and actions of the Transportation Commission. The secretary of the Department of Transportation shall cooperate with the members of the committee and assist them in carrying out their responsibilities. The secretary shall inform the members of the committee of the time and place of all meetings of the Transportation Commission and shall forward to the members of the committee copies of all materials sent to the members of the commission. The committee shall select a chair from among the committee's members and shall from time to time report to the Executive Board of the Legislative Research Council on the committee's activities. Members of the committee shall receive compensation as would any member of an interim legislative committee authorized by the Executive Board of the Legislative Research Council under chapter 2-9.
